body:
Comment 13: 
Hi Skip,

Can you post your binary, I tried to replicate your results but couldn't.


axentraserver(~/devel/issue1240) % cat fmt_bb0.go 
package main

import (
	"fmt"
)

func main() {
	foo := []byte{'1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6'}
	for i := range foo {
		fmt.Println(i, "=", foo[i])
	}
}

axentraserver(~/devel/issue1240) % ./5.out 
0 = 49
1 = 50
2 = 51
3 = 52
4 = 53
5 = 54
